skillTree.name: Barded Ithilmar Steed
skillTree.description: An extremely light yet resilient material, Ithilmar gives the same protection as heavy steel, but without slowing down its wearer.

skillTree.name: Speed of Asuryan
skillTree.description: The High Elves possess a natural skill that far outstrips the prowess of ordinary mortals.

skillTree.name: Ward of Loec
skillTree.description: The Trickster God knows all manner of ploys and ruses that can be used to counter missile attacks.

skillTree.name: Ward of Hoeth
skillTree.description: Knowledge can be used as a shield against magical attack.

skillTree.name: Favoured of Isha
skillTree.description: The Handmaiden's actions have gleaned the favour of the Earth Goddess.

skillTree.name: Immortality
skillTree.description: Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say no…

effects.description: When normally killed in action, this Hero will be wounded instead

skillTree.name: Mentor
skillTree.description: Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +50% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type

skillTree.name: Diplomat of the Everqueen
skillTree.description: As an envoy of Alarielle, the Handmaiden speaks with the authority of the Everqueen.

skillTree.name: Tactful
skillTree.description: In a culture where words can cut as deeply as blades, a tactful speech can stop conflicts and waylay wars.

skillTree.name: Forthcoming
skillTree.description: Not all intentions need be hidden behind words and poetry; sometimes, good diplomacy is direct diplomacy.

skillTree.name: Discreet
skillTree.description: A secret kept is a favour to be returned at a later time.

skillTree.name: Lieutenant of the Everqueen
skillTree.description: One of the Everqueen's inner circle; highly trusted, they will gladly die for the Everqueen if called upon to do so.

skillTree.name: Elven Ranger
skillTree.description: Handmaidens, like many Elves, excel at missile weapons, but this one's eye is especially keen.

skillTree.name: Bow Master
skillTree.description: A mistress of the bow, able to loose an arrow before a man can complete a blink.

skillTree.name: Hawkish Precision
skillTree.description: The eyes of the hawk, able to pluck a falling hair with a deft arrow sent from her bow.

effects.description:
Passive ability: "Hawkish Precision" for Archers, Lothern Seaguard, Shadow-walkers, Shadow Warriors, and Sister of Avelorn units
	(all units in army)

enabled_if: No enemy presence in ability range

skillTree.name: Protector of the Everqueen
skillTree.description: To protect and guard the Everqueen is an eternal honour and one that no Handmaiden has ever refused.

skillTree.name: Iron Maidens
skillTree.description: Do not mistake the title of Handmaiden as a serf, for they are warriors all, and incredibly powerful ones at that.

skillTree.name: Guardian
skillTree.description: As a guardian, the Warrioress is sworn to protect everything that Asur hold dear.

target_if: Unit is a Lord or Hero

skillTree.name: Improved Training
skillTree.description: Sisters under the command of this handmaiden move with a shocking quickness.

effects.description:
Speed: +10% for Sisters of Avelorn units
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.name: Enhanced Quivers
skillTree.description: The quivers of the Sisters under the command of this handmaiden seem unnaturally full.

effects.description:
Ammunition: +10% for Sisters of Avelorn units
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.name: Better Blades
skillTree.description: Ensorceled weaponry isn't a simple requisition...

effects.description:
Melee attack: +4 for Sisters of Avelorn units
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.name: Sacred Service
skillTree.description: The honor of serving under the command of this handmaiden is all the payment required.

effects.description:
Upkeep: -4% for Sisters of Avelorn units
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.name: Renowned
skillTree.description: A legendary presence, on the battlefield and off.

skillTree.name: Retinue: Valet
skillTree.description: My lord, I believe I’ve found something of interest...

effects.description:
Magic item drop chance: +5%
	(own characters in region)

Magic item drop chance: +10%
	(own characters in region)

Magic item drop chance: +20%
	(own characters in region)

skillTree.name: Inspirational
skillTree.description: We all must fight, no matter our station.

skillTree.name: Retinue: Quartermaster
skillTree.description: I’ve managed to procure some additional supplies for the troops, my lord.

effects.description:
Attrition: -3% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(own armies in region)

Attrition: -7% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(own armies in region)

Attrition: -15% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(own armies in region)

skillTree.name: Notorious
skillTree.description: It’s difficult to sleep with one eye open and a dagger under your pillow.

skillTree.name: Retinue: Physician
skillTree.description: We will establish triage and treatment centers as soon as we make camp, my lord.

effects.description:
Casualty replenishment rate: +5%
	(own armies in region)

skillTree.name: Weapon Master
skillTree.description: If you can swing, slash, stab, gouge, or shoot it, this warrior has mastered every aspect of its use.

skillTree.name: Valour of Ages
skillTree.description: Panic and fear are things that happen to others.

effects.description: Weapon strength: +10% when fighting against Dark Elves
Weapon strength: +15% when fighting against Greenskins, Skaven, Dark Elves, Beastmen, Warriors of Chaos, Daemons of Chaos and Norsca

skillTree.name: Hard to Hit
skillTree.description: Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, it’s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.

skillTree.name: Spear Master
skillTree.description: This warrior is one with their spear; it is an extension of their will, making them a worthy foe in combat.

skillTree.name: Indomitable
skillTree.description: The iron will and indomitable presence of this leader ensures their followers remain steadfast when facing peril.

skillTree.name: Foe-Seeker
skillTree.description: From one bloodied, lifeless corpse to the next, this one is always looking for the next adversary to best.

skillTree.name: Wound-Maker
skillTree.description: Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.

skillTree.name: Full Plate Armour
skillTree.description: Full-Plate armour protects the wearer from head-to-foot. Many such suits are blessed or imbued with arcane abilities.

skillTree.name: Shield of Avelorn
skillTree.description: Avelorn's shield protects its forests and queen, and is blessed with preternatural grace.

skillTree.name: Expeditious Endeavour
skillTree.description: What the enemy cannot see, it cannot hit. What the enemy cannot see, it cannot survive.

skillTree.name: Deadly Onslaught
skillTree.description: The war is endless. The cycle of charging, clashing, and bloody hand-to-hand fighting is without end. It will never stop.

skillTree.name: Replenish Troops
skillTree.description: Those in the army can find succour or be replenished by the power of this champion.

effects.description: Replenish Troops action: Replenishment rate is increased by an additional 3%
Replenish Troops action: Replenishment rate is increased by an additional 6%
Replenish Troops action: Replenishment rate is increased by an additional 9%

skillTree.name: Stimulate Growth
skillTree.description: All will listen, for the news will either be dire or wonderful.

effects.description: Stimulate Growth action: Growth is modified by an additional 10
Stimulate Growth action: Growth is modified by an additional 20
Stimulate Growth action: Growth is modified by an additional 30

skillTree.name: Damage Building
skillTree.description: It is not just the forces of Chaos that can despoil, break and ruin.

effects.description: Damage Building action: Additional 5% damage caused
Damage Building action: Additional 15% damage caused
Damage Building action: Additional 30% damage caused

skillTree.name: Wound
skillTree.description: Such a champion will not bend or break, but slay in their Lord's name.

effects.description: Wound action: Additional 5% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 12% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 21% chance of wounding target

skillTree.name: Hinder Replenishment
skillTree.description: The sight of a powerful figure extolling death and blasphemies can bring enemy ranks to their knees.

effects.description: Hinder Replenishment action: Replenishment is modified by an additional -10%
Hinder Replenishment action: Replenishment is modified by an additional -20%
Hinder Replenishment action: Replenishment is modified by an additional -40%

skillTree.name: Specialist
skillTree.description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

backgroundSkills.name: Disfavoured
backgroundSkills.description: This one is something of an eccentric; their erratic behaviour has upset powerful people, which is seldom a good idea.

effects.description:
Upkeep: +20% for Sisters of Avelorn units
	(Hero's army)

backgroundSkills.name: Flat-Footed
backgroundSkills.description: Don't take this one along if you need to get away quickly… or maybe you should…

backgroundSkills.name: Primed
backgroundSkills.description: Every fibre of their being is charged and ready for action - wherever, whenever.

backgroundSkills.name: Resilient
backgroundSkills.description: Armour is just a formality when you're as hard as nails and as tough as old boots.

backgroundSkills.name: Frigid
backgroundSkills.description: Stiff, starched, formal. Inflexible.

backgroundSkills.name: Advocate
backgroundSkills.description: Good ideas oft-times need vocal, public support to turn them into reality.

backgroundSkills.name: Healer
backgroundSkills.description: Armies can be mended as surely as people can, up to a point of course.

backgroundSkills.name: Fecund
backgroundSkills.description: Never short of new ideas, or new ways of looking at old problems.

backgroundSkills.name: Medic
backgroundSkills.description: I see something wrong and I fix it with my hands.

backgroundSkills.name: Amateurish
backgroundSkills.description: If there's a right way to do something, this one doesn't have the wherewithal to know what it is.

effects.description:
Melee attack: -3 for Spearmen, Silverin Guard, Rangers, Archers, Gate Guard and Lothern Sea Guard units
	(Hero's army)

Melee defence: -3 for Spearmen, Silverin Guard, Rangers, Archers, Gate Guard and Lothern Sea Guard units
	(Hero's army)

backgroundSkills.name: Intolerable
backgroundSkills.description: Some things should not have to be endured.

backgroundSkills.name: Crushing
backgroundSkills.description: On occasion, throwing the whole nine leagues at the enemy is just the ticket.

backgroundSkills.name: Honed
backgroundSkills.description: Skills refined and improved upon over time can only increase one's edge over the foe.

effects.description:
Melee attack: +5 for Shadow Warriors, Shadow-walkers and Silver Helms units
	(Hero's army)

Melee attack: +5 for Spearmen, Silverin Guard, Rangers, Archers, Gate Guard and Lothern Sea Guard units
	(Hero's army)

Melee defence: +5 for Shadow Warriors, Shadow-walkers and Silver Helms units
	(Hero's army)

Melee defence: +5 for Spearmen, Silverin Guard, Rangers, Archers, Gate Guard and Lothern Sea Guard units
	(Hero's army)

Unit experience gain: +25% for Sisters of Avelorn
	(Hero's army)

backgroundSkills.name: Hale & Hearty
backgroundSkills.description: The very picture of good health. Clearly, there's many years still ahead of them.

backgroundSkills.name: Vigorous
backgroundSkills.description: This one is not at all easy to kill, and many have tried, believe me.

backgroundSkills.name: Divisive
backgroundSkills.description: Hmmm interesting. I do wonder if there's a third way, however…

backgroundSkills.name: Attentive
backgroundSkills.description: The Daemon is very definitely in the detail…

backgroundSkills.name: Prudent
backgroundSkills.description: This one acts not for themselves but the for the greater good, in defence of the future.

backgroundSkills.name: Inhibited
backgroundSkills.description: This one doesn't even relax in their own company, so reserved is their nature.

backgroundSkills.name: Incendiary
backgroundSkills.description: You don't want to be on the wrong side of this one's ire - it's explosive to say the least!

backgroundSkills.name: Spry
backgroundSkills.description: Impressively energetic for a thousand years old - even by their own reckoning.

backgroundSkills.name: Incompetent
backgroundSkills.description: There's usually a right way and a wrong way to do anything. This one generally gets it wrong.

backgroundSkills.name: Meddler
backgroundSkills.description: This one can never leave something alone. They always have to meddle.

effects.description:
Construction cost: +10% for all buildings
	(local province)

backgroundSkills.name: Thinker
backgroundSkills.description: Fortunately, there are some who really apply themselves to the problems of the world. Just as well, otherwise we'd be… Oh wait...

effects.description:
Hero action success chance: +3%
	(own characters in region)

backgroundSkills.name: Entrepreneur
backgroundSkills.description: There's always a way - always an angle. You just have to find it.

backgroundSkills.name: Genius
backgroundSkills.description: An individual of exceptional skill and worth; the very embodiment of sagacity.

effects.description:
Enemy Hero action success chance: -25%
	(enemy characters in region)

backgroundSkills.name: Resistant
backgroundSkills.description: Action, inaction, change - you name it, this one will work against the prevailing wind.

effects.description:
Missile resistance: 5% for infantry units
	(Hero's army)
